column1: phyllis a. gaut| phyllis a. gaut
column4: went to be with the lord on saturday
column6: 2015 at altercare of navarre. she was born in stone creek on september 11
column7: 1930 to the late edward and erma (stucky) fellman and married howard d. gaut on february 3
column9: 2014. she retired in 1990 from the bakery at food-for-less in massillon. she is survived by children
column11: gale ady of bolivar and beth gaut of brewster; 7 grandchildren and 7 great grandchildren; a sister
column13: ky. in addition to her parents and husband
column14: she was preceded in death by a brother
column15: paul fellman. funeral services will be held on tuesday at 2:00 pm at the spidell funeral home in brewster. burial will follow in the union lawn cemetery in navarre. friends may call on tuesday from noon until 2:00 pm at the funeral home. upcoming events. visitationjun 16. 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm spidell funeral home - brewster209 chestnut street
